rooms.description: A welcoming space that leads to the main living area.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with a spacious living and dining area, aligned per Vastu to ensure natural light from the east. Includes built-in storage and an open view of the garden.
Dedicated workspace with a quiet environment, ideally placed in the northeast corner as per Vastu principles for productivity.
A comfortable guest bedroom designed to serve as an additional sleeping area when needed. Placed on the south side to maintain positive energy flow.
A dedicated entertainment room with soundproof walls and optimized seating arrangement towards the north-west to enhance acoustics. Includes a projector screen and ambient lighting.
